welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.subTitle: Tashtiba
welcome.description: Your one-stop shop for all your needs - exclusive discounts, fast delivery, and unbeatable offers!

AboutSection.heading: Our mission? To turn your vision into reality.
AboutSection.description: At Tashtiba, we don't just sell products; we offer integrated solutions that make your home finishing journey a smooth and enjoyable experience. From the foundations to the final touches, we're your partner every step of the way.

quality.title: Unparalleled quality
quality.description: We select the best suppliers and products to ensure the highest quality standards in every piece.

price.title: Affordable prices
price.description: We offer competitive prices that don't compromise on quality or style quality.

delivery.title: Fast and reliable delivery
delivery.description: We prioritize speed and reliability to ensure your home finishes are delivered on time and in perfect condition.

Politics.heading: Information you need
Politics.description: Everything you need to know about our policies.

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: We guarantee the best delivery speed

fullCoverage.title: Full Coverage
fullCoverage.description: Coverage across all cities in the Republic
